Rules.InvariantScript: If('Phone Number validation'.ClearIcon = true, If('Phone Number validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Disabled || 'Phone Number validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.View, false, If('Phone Number validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Edit && IsBlank(TextInput1_24.Text), false, true)), false)

If('Phone Number validation'.ClearIcon = true, If('Phone Number validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Disabled || 'Phone Number validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.View, false, If('Phone Number validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Edit && IsBlank(TextInput1_24.Text), false, true)), false)

If('Phone Number validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Disabled, DisplayMode.Disabled, If('Phone Number validation'.DisplayMode = DisplayMode.Edit && IsBlank(TextInput1_24.Text), DisplayMode.Disabled, DisplayMode.Edit))

If('Phone Number validation'.ValidateOnChange = true, 'Phone Number validation'.IsUSPhoneNumber(PhoneNumberTxt) = false && !(IsBlank(PhoneNumberTxt)), 'Phone Number validation'.IsUSPhoneNumber(TextInput1_24.Text) = false && !(IsBlank(TextInput1_24.Text)))
